About Me

Hi, my name’s Quentin and I’m a robotics software engineer. I specialize in developing behavior and motion planning algorithms for safe autonomous driving with hands-on experience being the safety engineer for tests and demonstrations. I’m also familiar with the system-level integration of the robotics stack, having taken on tasks such as diagnosing issues encountered during testing and coordinating major code releases between teams.

I am most skilled in: Robotics, ROS, C++, and helping others debug seg faults.
